DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Measuring level transform growth factor-beta ( TGF-beta ) blood patient epithelial cancer ( head neck , lung , breast , colorectal , prostate ) may help doctor predict patient respond treatment radiation therapy . PURPOSE : This research study measure level TGF-beta patient epithelial cancer undergo radiation therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Growth Factor Levels Blood Patients Undergoing Radiation Therapy Epithelial Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine whether dose-dependent increase TGF-beta follow radiotherapy patient epithelial cancer . OUTLINE : Patients undergo blood sample collection prior treatment , 24-72 hour first fraction radiotherapy , end radiotherapy . Patients also ask weekly blood sample , optional . Samples analyze compare pre- post-treatment TGF-beta level .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Known diagnosis epithelial cancer , include follow : Head neck Lung Breast Colorectal Prostate Radiotherapy must component plan treatment therapy PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : No serious medical psychiatric illness would prevent informed consent
